backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing lead capture requests in a map with functions to create requests, check submission status, and return all entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file in the SwiftSport project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and defining metadata, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing the header, landing page, and footer layout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Reusable logo component that renders the SwiftSport logo in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding, navigation links, contact details, availability info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/lead/ChatbotLead: Interactive chatbot widget guiding users through a multi-step referee request form with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: A marketing contact section with email and phone info, including copy-to-clipboard functionality and styled UI blocks.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: A hero banner with CTA buttons, stats, and a hero image, including smooth-scrolling actions to other sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: A five‑step process section that displays steps with icons and descriptions, plus a button that scrolls to the contact form.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: A services grid listing officiating offerings and a sports coverage subsection with an image and bullet list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for submitting and fetching referee requests using the backend actor, with react‑query mutations and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes, base typography, and utility classes including a soft shadow.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the marketing landing page using hero, services, process, contact, and chatbot lead-capture sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended typography, animations, shadows, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, required features, branding updates, image requirements, and lead‑capture functionality needs.
